name: DanceParty - Dance with Music
description:
DanceParty is an AI-supported dance app allowing you freely dance wherever you want with various rhythmical music we provide.

It is indeed a platform that you can easily have fun. The more, highly different with hard & toilsome gym exercise, considering DanceParty as your lovely & effective fitness tool! Enjoy music, dance and keep a nice shape!

In DanceParty, you can:
-Enjoy unlimited dance video with pop music
-Simply complete a dance by following the guide tips & posing accurately
-Invite friends & Battle with them with one click
-Get exercised in a leisure way & always have a healthy mode
-Enjoy weekly updated dance music

Trust me, You can dance!

If you had any suggestion, please contact us by iMessage or email without hesitation: danceparty_service@outlook.com, your advice makes DanceParty better!
